content: >http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_SWINE_FLU_DEATH?SITE=AP&SECTION=HOME&TEMPLATE=DEFAULT&CTIME=2009-05-02-16-57-20 The death of a toddler, child of a wealthy Mexican family who had been staying in Brownsville Tx when he became ill in early April, is being blamed on the 'Swine' Flu. The deaths of two middle-aged men in California last week were initially thought to be related to the flu.
reply: >http://hosted.ap.org/dynamic/stories/U/US_SWINE_FLU_DEATH?SITE=AP&SECTION=HOME&TEMPLATE=DEFAULT&CTIME=2009-05-02-16-57-20 The death of a toddler, child of a wealthy Mexican family who had been staying in Brownsville Tx when he became ill in early April, is being blamed on the 'Swine' Flu. The deaths of two middle-aged men in California last week were initially thought to be related to the flu.
title: First Flu-related Death in US

content: Sad news. The death of a child always is. Important to note, that the child had a compromised immune system....
